"Another day, another dollar." You mumbled as you clocked your time card in at work. You had worked at InterShip for about 3 months now, and it had never been a particularly fun experience. Still, as a semi-broke college student, you really needed the money, and InterShip was particularly close to campus. As one of the world's largest shipping companies, they handled tens of thousands of packages a day from all over the world and containing anything from clothes to food to toys. If it was ordered online, chances are it passed through and InterShip facility.

As you walked into the sorting room, you nearly walked right into Kathryn. "Watch where you're going." Kathryn huffed as she pushed past you, more annoyed than angry. She had worked with you since your very first day on the job, and you were not too happy about it. The two of you had never gotten along. From the moment you met her, she had been nothing but condescending and rude to you. The 21 year old girl had worked at the shipping facility for a little over a year, and as such she was appointed to supervise you when you started out. She never missed an opportunity to remind you she was in charge of you, and her position of power over you left you little choice but to grin and bear it.

The only nice thing you had to say about Kathryn is that she was a very attrative girl. She had a beautiful face framed by long straight brown hair, with full pink lips and green eyes. Her work uniform wasn't exactly flattering, but you could easily tell that it covered an excellent figure. Even after Kathryn fininsed wringing you out, you couldn't help but watch her walk away, her ass swaying with every step she took.

One thing you had noticed recently was that the bitchy girl had a habit of sneaking off down a side hallway he'd never seem anyone else go down. In fact, you were pretty sure that during the tour when you started working in the building, someone had informed you that that section of the building was unsafe and no longer used. Weirder still was the fact that Kathryn always looked around before entering, as though to make sure no one was watching. Finally, there was the fact that she often carried a box in with her, but usually came out without one. All of these observations led you to one conclusion: Kathryn was stealing packages.

You couldn't help but get excited at the thought of your realization. If you were right, you could rat her out and finally be rid of Kathryn once and fall. Of course, you'd need proof, and the only way to get that was by venturing back into Kathryn's secret room and taking a look for yourself at what you could find.

As soon as the opportunity arose, you made your move. You saw Kathryn walk out of her secret hallway and head off towards the other side of the building. You hurredly dropped all your other work and made a beeline for the door, not knowing how much time you had left before she returned.

Heading down the hall, you saw there were several doors to choose from on either side. Fortunately though, one was slightly ajar, signaling Kathryn's recent departure.

You didn't know what to expect as you entered the room, but it was nothing like what you saw. The room you walked into looked like a workshop of sorts, with scattered tools and glue along with empty boxes ready to be filled. However, the main thing that caught your eye was the plastic containers on the shelf. When you noticed movement inside them, you naturally assumed they contained some kind of small pets like hamsters or something, but you could not have been more wrong. As you peered through the plastic walls of the container, you found yourself looking into the eyes of several incredibly frightened tiny people, all of them pointing at you.

Before you could further process what you were seeing, a bright of flash light appeared from behind you, seeming to engulf the whole room. When the flash dissipated, you found yourself standing tiny on the hard tile floor, looking up at a massive Kathryn.

"What the hell Kathryn?" You yelled, unable to believe that the formerly short girl could now tower over you so easily. It had been one thing to see the tiny people from normal size, but he never imagined how they saw regular sized people.

"It's not that complicated Adam." Kathryn said, snatching you up off the floor and pulling you up to her face. You felt a rush of vertigo as you shot up into the air like you were launched in a rocket. And when your head cleared, you were greeted with the sight of the massive smiling bitch as you were dangled mere inches in front of her face. It was incredibly indimating to be this close to her face, watching her gigantic mouth open and shut as her warm breath washed over you with every word she spoke. "I shrunk you because you stumbled upon my little side job. You see, the main reason I work here is so that I can use the shipping companies resources to mail tiny little people all over the world. Do you have any idea how much people are willing to shell out for a real live tiny?"

In a flash, you were no longer in front of her face, but being held over Kathryn's workbench, where she was apparently preparing people for transport. The first box you came across was the exact same box a Barbie doll would come in from the toy store. But instead of a Barbie inside, there was a real life 6 inch tall blonde girl, desperately banging on plastic. "Katie here was my lab partner until yesterday, when I got another order for one of my live Barbie's and decided i wastired of her not pulling her weight. Now she's going to be a doll for a little girl named Mary in Ohio." With a cruel laugh, Kathryn flicked the plastic film of the box, knocking tiny Katie back onto her ass. The next box contained a pair of flip flops, but with a two identical looking tiny men stapled right where the ball of a gigantic foot would rest, one one each. "I actually don't know these two, just ran into them at the mall. Couldn't pass up a good pair of twins, they make perfect matching pairs for things like this. I'm sure Isabel from Missouri will love them."

Apparently satisfied that she had shown off enough of her creations, she turned her attention back to you. "The real question now though is what I ought to do with you. You're actually not the first person to discover my little operation. In fact, the reason you have this job is because the last girl to work here found out about me as well."

"What happened to her?" You asked, not sure you wanted to know.

Kathryn smiled a tooth grin to your question, clearly glad you asked. "Well her little discovery happened to line up pretty well with my friend Amy's birthday, and she made the perfect present. Last I heard, Amy has still been using her as her little personal dildo every night since. A little living vibrator without any need for batteries. I've been meaning to get one of those for myself."

The more Kathryn spoke, the more you felt like throwing up. The idea that the cruel bitch holding you in her fist had made a business of her own tiny slave trade was nearly unbelievable, but the tight grip he was wrapped in continued to remind him it was true.

"Of course, none of this really matters now. What I'm more concerned with is what to do with you." Kathryn mused, her mind full of twisted ideas.

It's been a while since I've dipped into my own stock, and I bet I could have a lot of fun with you. Her foot thundered down, a mere inch away from your legs. And then it rose again. A few seconds was all it took for her to vanish into another corridor.

Their voices were muffled and so you couldn't make out what they were saying - or how many were there. You looked to the others. The gaps under the other doors were to small for you to squeeze through and every second you wasted here was another tick on the clock until Renee noticed your escape. James and Autumn nodded, grim determination on their faces. You had to risk it.

Slowly, you pushed yourselves through the crack into the room behind... and were instantly knocked over by another maid, wearing the same uniform, passing by. The gust created by her foot slammed you backwards into the wall. James pulled you back into the doorframe.

She didn't seem all that focused, her eyes wandering from the skillet infront of her over the room. Another one was standing with her back to you, filling up the fridge. You could only barely glimpse inside - but you could feel your stomach rumble at the delicacies you saw.
The last maid was almost running around the kitchen, putting away all sorts of things into various cupboards, pulling out ingredients, and checking for stains. You would have to be careful. The others were relatively still, but she was like a hurricane. If you were on the floor, it might only be a manner of seconds until she was above you. And if you didn't have a plan then, you would almost certainly be squished underneath her feet.

But there was hope! On the opposite site of the kitchen was another door, completely open. You could see inside the spacious dining room. The hurried maid was going in ocasionally to set the table - but except for her, the room seemed empty. If you reached it, you might be safe for a while.

It was now or never. You, James, and Autumn pressed yourself against the wall and slowly inched towards the door on the opposite side of the kitchen...
